title: There's 3 things guaranteed in life
body: Death, taxes and ezreal getting a jungle item nerfed each season

replies.body: And I expected a 3 hit passive joke..
But nowawadays, we can call that 2 things with devourer
i have a better idea then nerfing items...nerf ez...oh but wait rito would never touch their golden boy
{{champion:64}} Hello
I think last time Riot tried to nerf Lee Sin I think that Cancer, I mean Reddit flipped out and demanded he was untouched.
Except they nerfed him.
They pulled a whole rework and trashed it due to community backlash. They didn't let the community influence reworks, changes, and nerfs for anyone else. Doesn't make any sense.

They still implemented parts of the rework.
Also, when that happened, the non-stupid part of the community was asking riot. The ones that actually know what they're talking about.
And honestly I wouldn't listen to this community for shit either way. This is the community that thought J4 was worse than lee a couple months ago.

The problem is that it feels like half of the community mains Lee Sin, and no matter how balanced a rework is, they'd rather see him nerfed in other ways to preserve the playstyle they've loved through his years. 

I know the G&P community seems to hate Riven, but if there was a way to nerf her numbers without changing her kit EVERY Riven main would want that more than any rework that could be proposed for her, simply because they've played the champion for such a long time and don't want to have all that learning go into the garbage with 1 patch.
I don't even think Jarvan was overpowered, he was just able to jungle well unlike most of the junglers at the time.
l0l
Reminder that Lee Sin has been nerfed 10 times since his release.

meanwhile irelia has only been nerfed 7 times (2 of which were stat nerfs that have been reverted).

Better nerf Irelia am I right?
It wasn't just Reddit.
Ah yes however, if he was talking a literal golden boy, then Ezreal is indeed Rito's golden boy
Ezreal has been nerfed so many times. Just... so many times.
I think he's just talking about how Ez is blonde.
Don't mind my stupidity, then.
who is  this "easy" ?

The 4th guarantee:

Your team will never upgrade their trinkets

You realize 3 out of 4 of Ezreal's abilities are frieken skillshots right?
If you cant click left to dodge his Q/W/R then that means you just suck, its not the champion. I haven't had any problem with ezreal, mid or adc.

Believe it or not the dude is completely reliant on the PLAYER'S skill, if you sucked with Ezreal before Runeglaive, you will still suck with ezreal after Runeglaive. ---ergo hes balanced.

Yorik's ult breaking something.
Pretty sure it holds the record for "breaking thing".

Eh, Azirs wall is up there too, it's only been much more short lived. So far it has:

Broken Jayces gate.

Broken Mordes Ghost.

Broken Yoricks ult.

Broken turrets.

Broken Dragon.

And broken a plethora of invisible-minion-based abilities out of sheer shitty coding.

What..? He's not even the sole reason the this jungle item or Elder Lizard got nerfed... lol. Elder Lizard had Evelynn to thank, really. lol. Her Q was much more OP with it. The Runeglaive has a lot of issues with making Evelynn, again, over the top powerful, Diana is now ungodly strong in the jungle (Moreso than usual), Fizz can lane with the item and roll his face on his keyboard because it's got such high base damage, plus turns the AD ratio on his Q (The 100% of his AD part) into magic damage... I mean, Ez is the only one you see in LCS, sure, but that doesn't mean he's the only one abusing the ever living crap out of it. We've got a LOT of offenders this time around.
fizz's q already scales magic damage and deals magic damage
